column1: Little Goat Diner////My default rule at all diners is to order eggs
column3: and toast. Â  My default rule at a pancake house is to order the omelette and pancakes. Since this was skewed towards a diner
column4: I was going to order some farm fresh eggs
column7: but I was intrigued by all the pancake options
column8: especially the sourdough pancakes. I initially told my waitress that I wanted those
column9: but then I became indecisive and withdrew the order. Looking back on it
column10: I should have ordered those with a side of eggs and bacon.
